author: Douglas Belkin, Melissa Korn
title: Coronavirus Creates College Uncertainty, Admissions Gets Easier - The Wall Street Journal
description: Coronavirus Creates College Uncertainty, Admissions Gets Easier The Wall Street Journal COVID-19 Pandemic Spurs More Institutions To Go With Test-Optional Admissions Forbes University of North Georgia student tests positive for COVID-19 Atlanta Journal Consti…
content:
As the coronavirus pandemic upends college life, it is causing a knock-on effect for admissions: High-school seniors may find it easier to get into some schools this year.
Students considering offers or awaiting decisions later this week from colleges across… [+161 chars]
